title: Because My Toilet Turned Into a Dungeon, Taking Care of My Business Has Become too Difficult - Novel Updates
tags: Demons   Determined Protagonist   Dragons   Dungeons   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Goblins   Monsters   Oneshot   Pragmatic Protagonist   Quirky Characters   Stubborn Protagonist   Sword Wielder   Weak to Strong

description: A short story about a girl whose toilet has turned into a dungeon. She will be telling you the story of her heroic tale from yesterday.>
